overview: Award winning director Michael Zen has done it again with the mega budget features, shot on film, exclusively for Cal Vista. The Sultry. Stacy Valentine stars as a hapless film student who accidentally films a powerful politician... in DRAG! He'll do anything to keep the tape from falling into the wrong hands. So watch Stacy, Jeanna Fine, Rebecca Lord and a whole H O S T of D E L I C I O U S beauties mark their ballots with a big pink X. "Expose Me Again". You, can't beat a juicy scandal!
title: Expose Me Again
